verses.english: I will extol thee, O LORD; for thou hast lifted me up, and hast not made my foes to rejoice over me.

strongs_def: properly, instrumental music; by implication, a poem set to notes
gloss: psalm.

strongs_def: a song; abstractly, singing
gloss: musical(-ick), [idiom] sing(-er, -ing), song.

strongs_def: initiation, i.e. consecration
gloss: dedicating(-tion).

strongs_def: a house (in the greatest variation of applications, especially family, etc.)
gloss: court, daughter, door, [phrase] dungeon, family, [phrase] forth of, [idiom] great as would contain, hangings, home(born), (winter) house(-hold), inside(-ward), palace, place, [phrase] prison, [phrase] steward, [phrase] tablet, temple, web, [phrase] within(-out).

derivation: rarely (fully); דָּוִיד; from the same as H1730 (דּוֹד); loving;
strongs_def: David, the youngest son of Jesse
gloss: David.

strongs_def: to be high actively, to rise or raise (in various applications, literally or figuratively)
gloss: bring up, exalt (self), extol, give, go up, haughty, heave (up), (be, lift up on, make on, set up on, too) high(-er, one), hold up, levy, lift(-er) up, (be) lofty, ([idiom] a-) loud, mount up, offer (up), [phrase] presumptuously, (be) promote(-ion), proud, set up, tall(-er), take (away, off, up), breed worms.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

derivation: a primitive particle (the full form of the prepositional prefix) indicating causal relations of all kinds, antecedent or consequent;
strongs_def: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
gloss: and, + (forasmuch, inasmuch, where-) as, assured(-ly), + but, certainly, doubtless, + else, even, + except, for, how, (because, in, so, than) that, + nevertheless, now, rightly, seeing, since, surely, then, therefore, + (al-) though, + till, truly, + until, when, whether, while, whom, yea, yet.

strongs_def: properly, to dangle, i.e. to let down abucket (for drawing out water); figuratively, to deliver
gloss: draw (out), [idiom] enough, lift up.

derivation: or לוֹא; or לֹה; (Deuteronomy 3:11), a primitive particle;
strongs_def: not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
gloss: [idiom] before, [phrase] or else, ere, [phrase] except, ig(-norant), much, less, nay, neither, never, no((-ne), -r, (-thing)), ([idiom] as though...,(can-), for) not (out of), of nought, otherwise, out of, [phrase] surely, [phrase] as truly as, [phrase] of a truth, [phrase] verily, for want, [phrase] whether, without.

strongs_def: probably to brighten up, i.e. (figuratively) be (causatively, make) blithe or gleesome
gloss: cheer up, be (make) glad, (have, make) joy(-ful), be (make) merry, (cause to, make to) rejoice, [idiom] very.

derivation: or (fully) אוֹיֵב; active participle of H340 (אָיַב);
strongs_def: hating; an adversary
gloss: enemy, foe.

verses.header: ¶ A Psalm *and* Song *at* the dedication of the house of David.

verses.english: O LORD my God, I cried unto thee, and thou hast healed me.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

strongs_def: properly, to be free; but used only causatively and reflexively, to halloo (for help, i.e. freedom from some trouble)
gloss: cry (aloud, out), shout.

derivation: (but only used in the shortened constructive form אֶל ); a primitive particle; properly, denoting motion towards, but occasionally used of a quiescent position, i.e.
strongs_def: near, with or among; often in general, to
gloss: about, according to, after, against, among, as for, at, because(-fore, -side), both...and, by, concerning, for, from, [idiom] hath, in(-to), near, (out) of, over, through, to(-ward), under, unto, upon, whether, with(-in).

strongs_def: properly, to mend (by stitching), i.e. (figuratively) to cure
gloss: cure, (cause to) heal, physician, repair, [idiom] thoroughly, make whole. See H7503 (רָפָה).

verses.english: O LORD, thou hast brought up my soul from the grave: thou hast kept me alive, that I should not go down to the pit.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: to ascend, intransitively (be high) or actively (mount); used in a great variety of senses, primary and secondary, literal and figurative
gloss: arise (up), (cause to) ascend up, at once, break (the day) (up), bring (up), (cause to) burn, carry up, cast up, [phrase] shew, climb (up), (cause to, make to) come (up), cut off, dawn, depart, exalt, excel, fall, fetch up, get up, (make to) go (away, up); grow (over) increase, lay, leap, levy, lift (self) up, light, (make) up, [idiom] mention, mount up, offer, make to pay, [phrase] perfect, prefer, put (on), raise, recover, restore, (make to) rise (up), scale, set (up), shoot forth (up), (begin to) spring (up), stir up, take away (up), work.

derivation: or מִנִּי; or מִנֵּי; (constructive plural) (Isaiah 30:11); for H4482 (מֵן);
strongs_def: properly, a part of; hence (prepositionally), from or out of in many senses
gloss: above, after, among, at, because of, by (reason of), from (among), in, [idiom] neither, [idiom] nor, (out) of, over, since, [idiom] then, through, [idiom] whether, with.

strongs_def: Hades or the world of the dead (as if a subterranean retreat), including its accessories and inmates
gloss: grave, hell, pit.

strongs_def: properly, a breathing creature, i.e. animal of (abstractly) vitality; used very widely in a literal, accommodated or figurative sense (bodily or mental)
gloss: any, appetite, beast, body, breath, creature, [idiom] dead(-ly), desire, [idiom] (dis-) contented, [idiom] fish, ghost, [phrase] greedy, he, heart(-y), (hath, [idiom] jeopardy of) life ([idiom] in jeopardy), lust, man, me, mind, mortally, one, own, person, pleasure, (her-, him-, my-, thy-) self, them (your) -selves, [phrase] slay, soul, [phrase] tablet, they, thing, ([idiom] she) will, [idiom] would have it.

strongs_def: to live, whether literally or figuratively; causatively, to revive
gloss: keep (leave, make) alive, [idiom] certainly, give (promise) life, (let, suffer to) live, nourish up, preserve (alive), quicken, recover, repair, restore (to life), revive, ([idiom] God) save (alive, life, lives), [idiom] surely, be whole.

strongs_def: to descend (literally, to go downwards; or conventionally to a lower region, as the shore, a boundary, the enemy, etc.; or figuratively, to fall); causatively, to bring down (in all the above applications)
gloss: [idiom] abundantly, bring down, carry down, cast down, (cause to) come(-ing) down, fall (down), get down, go(-ing) down(-ward), hang down, [idiom] indeed, let down, light (down), put down (off), (cause to, let) run down, sink, subdue, take down.

strongs_def: to descend (literally, to go downwards; or conventionally to a lower region, as the shore, a boundary, the enemy, etc.; or figuratively, to fall); causatively, to bring down (in all the above applications)
gloss: [idiom] abundantly, bring down, carry down, cast down, (cause to) come(-ing) down, fall (down), get down, go(-ing) down(-ward), hang down, [idiom] indeed, let down, light (down), put down (off), (cause to, let) run down, sink, subdue, take down.

derivation: from H952 (בּוּר) (in the sense of H877 (בֹּאר));
strongs_def: a pit hole (especially one used as a cistern or a prison)
gloss: cistern, dungeon, fountain, pit, well.

verses.english: Sing unto the LORD, O ye saints of his, and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness.

derivation: a primitive root (perhaps identical with H2168 (זָמַר) through the idea of striking with the fingers); properly, to touch the strings or parts of a musical instrument, i.e.
strongs_def: play upon it; to make music, accompanied by the voice; hence to celebrate in song and music
gloss: give praise, sing forth praises, psalms.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: properly, kind, i.e. (religiously) pious (a saint)
gloss: godly (man), good, holy (one), merciful, saint, (un-) godly.

derivation: a primitive root; used only as denominative from H3027 (יָד); literally, to use (i.e. hold out) the hand;
strongs_def: physically, to throw (a stone, an arrow) at or away; especially to revere or worship (with extended hands); intensively, to bemoan (by wringing the hands)
gloss: cast (out), (make) confess(-ion), praise, shoot, (give) thank(-ful, -s, -sgiving).

strongs_def: a memento, abstractly recollection (rarely if ever); by implication, commemoration
gloss: memorial, memory, remembrance, scent.

strongs_def: a sacred place or thing; rarely abstract, sanctity
gloss: consecrated (thing), dedicated (thing), hallowed (thing), holiness, ([idiom] most) holy ([idiom] day, portion, thing), saint, sanctuary.

verses.english: For his anger endureth but a moment; in his favour is life: weeping may endure for a night, but joy cometh in the morning.

derivation: a primitive particle (the full form of the prepositional prefix) indicating causal relations of all kinds, antecedent or consequent;
strongs_def: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
gloss: and, + (forasmuch, inasmuch, where-) as, assured(-ly), + but, certainly, doubtless, + else, even, + except, for, how, (because, in, so, than) that, + nevertheless, now, rightly, seeing, since, surely, then, therefore, + (al-) though, + till, truly, + until, when, whether, while, whom, yea, yet.

strongs_def: a wink (of the eyes), i.e. a very short space of time
gloss: instant, moment, space, suddenly.

strongs_def: properly, the nose or nostril; hence, the face, and occasionally a person; also (from the rapid breathing in passion) ire
gloss: anger(-gry), [phrase] before, countenance, face, [phrase] forebearing, forehead, [phrase] (long-) suffering, nose, nostril, snout, [idiom] worthy, wrath.

strongs_def: alive; hence, raw (flesh); fresh (plant, water, year), strong; also (as noun, especially in the feminine singular and masculine plural) life (or living thing), whether literally or figuratively
gloss: [phrase] age, alive, appetite, (wild) beast, company, congregation, life(-time), live(-ly), living (creature, thing), maintenance, [phrase] merry, multitude, [phrase] (be) old, quick, raw, running, springing, troop.

strongs_def: delight (especially as shown)
gloss: (be) acceptable(-ance, -ed), delight, desire, favour, (good) pleasure, (own, self, voluntary) will, as...(what) would.

strongs_def: dusk
gloss: [phrase] day, even(-ing, tide), night.

strongs_def: to stop (usually over night); by implication, to stay permanently; hence (in a bad sense) to be obstinate (especially in words, to complain)
gloss: abide (all night), continue, dwell, endure, grudge, be left, lie all night, (cause to) lodge (all night, in, -ing, this night), (make to) murmur, remain, tarry (all night, that night).

strongs_def: a weeping; by analogy, a dripping
gloss: overflowing, [idiom] sore, (continual) weeping, wept.

strongs_def: properly, dawn (as the break of day); generally, morning
gloss: ([phrase]) day, early, morning, morrow.

strongs_def: properly, a creaking (or shrill sound), i.e. shout (of joy or grief)
gloss: cry, gladness, joy, proclamation, rejoicing, shouting, sing(-ing), triumph.

verses.english: And in my prosperity I said, I shall never be moved.

strongs_def: I
gloss: I, (as for) me, mine, myself, we, [idiom] which, [idiom] who.

strongs_def: to say (used with great latitude)
gloss: answer, appoint, avouch, bid, boast self, call, certify, challenge, charge, [phrase] (at the, give) command(-ment), commune, consider, declare, demand, [idiom] desire, determine, [idiom] expressly, [idiom] indeed, [idiom] intend, name, [idiom] plainly, promise, publish, report, require, say, speak (against, of), [idiom] still, [idiom] suppose, talk, tell, term, [idiom] that is, [idiom] think, use (speech), utter, [idiom] verily, [idiom] yet.

strongs_def: security
gloss: prosperity.

strongs_def: properly, a failure; by implication nothing; usually (adverb) not at all; also lest
gloss: lest, neither, no, none (that...), not (any), nothing.

strongs_def: to waver; by implication, to slip, shake, fall
gloss: be carried, cast, be out of course, be fallen in decay, [idiom] exceedingly, fall(-ing down), be (re-) moved, be ready, shake, slide, slip.

strongs_def: properly, concealed, i.e. the vanishing point; generally, time out of mind (past or future), i.e. (practically) eternity; frequentatively, adverbial (especially with prepositional prefix) always
gloss: alway(-s), ancient (time), any more, continuance, eternal, (for, (n-)) ever(-lasting, -more, of old), lasting, long (time), (of) old (time), perpetual, at any time, (beginning of the) world ([phrase] without end). Compare H5331 (נֶצַח), H5703 (עַד).

verses.english: LORD, by thy favour thou hast made my mountain to stand strong: thou didst hide thy face, and I was troubled.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: delight (especially as shown)
gloss: (be) acceptable(-ance, -ed), delight, desire, favour, (good) pleasure, (own, self, voluntary) will, as...(what) would.

strongs_def: to stand, in various relations (literal and figurative, intransitive and transitive)
gloss: abide (behind), appoint, arise, cease, confirm, continue, dwell, be employed, endure, establish, leave, make, ordain, be (over), place, (be) present (self), raise up, remain, repair, [phrase] serve, set (forth, over, -tle, up), (make to, make to be at a, with-) stand (by, fast, firm, still, up), (be at a) stay (up), tarry.

derivation: from an unused root meaning to loom up;
strongs_def: a mountain
gloss: hill, mount(-ain).

strongs_def: strength in various applications (force, security, majesty, praise)
gloss: boldness, loud, might, power, strength, strong.

strongs_def: to hide (by covering), literally or figuratively
gloss: be absent, keep close, conceal, hide (self), (keep) secret, [idiom] surely.

derivation: plural (but always as singular) of an unused noun פָּנֶה; from H6437 (פָּנָה));
strongs_def: the face (as the part that turns); used in a great variety of applications (literally and figuratively); also (with prepositional prefix) as a preposition (before, etc.)
gloss: [phrase] accept, a-(be-) fore(-time), against, anger, [idiom] as (long as), at, [phrase] battle, [phrase] because (of), [phrase] beseech, countenance, edge, [phrase] employ, endure, [phrase] enquire, face, favour, fear of, for, forefront(-part), form(-er time, -ward), from, front, heaviness, [idiom] him(-self), [phrase] honourable, [phrase] impudent, [phrase] in, it, look(-eth) (-s), [idiom] me, [phrase] meet, [idiom] more than, mouth, of, off, (of) old (time), [idiom] on, open, [phrase] out of, over against, the partial, person, [phrase] please, presence, propect, was purposed, by reason of, [phrase] regard, right forth, [phrase] serve, [idiom] shewbread, sight, state, straight, [phrase] street, [idiom] thee, [idiom] them(-selves), through ([phrase] -out), till, time(-s) past, (un-) to(-ward), [phrase] upon, upside ([phrase] down), with(-in, [phrase] -stand), [idiom] ye, [idiom] you.

strongs_def: to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)
gloss: beacon, [idiom] altogether, be(-come), accomplished, committed, like), break, cause, come (to pass), do, faint, fall, [phrase] follow, happen, [idiom] have, last, pertain, quit (one-) self, require, [idiom] use.

strongs_def: to tremble inwardly (or palpitate), i.e. (figuratively) be (causative, make) (suddenly) alarmed or agitated; by implication to hasten anxiously
gloss: be (make) affrighted (afraid, amazed, dismayed, rash), (be, get, make) haste(-n, -y, -ily), (give) speedy(-ily), thrust out, trouble, vex.

verses.english: I cried to thee, O LORD; and unto the LORD I made supplication.

derivation: (but only used in the shortened constructive form אֶל ); a primitive particle; properly, denoting motion towards, but occasionally used of a quiescent position, i.e.
strongs_def: near, with or among; often in general, to
gloss: about, according to, after, against, among, as for, at, because(-fore, -side), both...and, by, concerning, for, from, [idiom] hath, in(-to), near, (out) of, over, through, to(-ward), under, unto, upon, whether, with(-in).

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

derivation: a primitive root (rather identical with H7122 (קָרָא) through the idea of accosting a person met);
strongs_def: to call out to (i.e. properly, address by name, but used in a wide variety of applications)
gloss: bewray (self), that are bidden, call (for, forth, self, upon), cry (unto), (be) famous, guest, invite, mention, (give) name, preach, (make) proclaim(-ation), pronounce, publish, read, renowned, say.

derivation: (but only used in the shortened constructive form אֶל ); a primitive particle; properly, denoting motion towards, but occasionally used of a quiescent position, i.e.
strongs_def: near, with or among; often in general, to
gloss: about, according to, after, against, among, as for, at, because(-fore, -side), both...and, by, concerning, for, from, [idiom] hath, in(-to), near, (out) of, over, through, to(-ward), under, unto, upon, whether, with(-in).

strongs_def: the Lord (used as a proper name of God only)
gloss: (my) Lord.

strongs_def: properly, to bend or stoop in kindness to an inferior; to favor, bestow; causatively to implore (i.e. move to favor by petition)
gloss: beseech, [idiom] fair, (be, find, shew) favour(-able), be (deal, give, grant (gracious(-ly), intreat, (be) merciful, have (shew) mercy (on, upon), have pity upon, pray, make supplication, [idiom] very.

verses.english: What profit is there in my blood, when I go down to the pit? Shall the dust praise thee? shall it declare thy truth?

derivation: or מַה; or מָ; or מַ; also מֶה; a primitive particle;
strongs_def: properly, interrogative what? (including how? why? when?); but also exclamation, what! (including how!), or indefinitely what (including whatever, and even relatively, that which); often used with prefixes in various adverbial or conjunctive senses
gloss: how (long, oft, (-soever)), (no-) thing, what (end, good, purpose, thing), whereby(-fore, -in, -to, -with), (for) why.

strongs_def: plunder; by extension, gain (usually unjust)
gloss: covetousness, (dishonest) gain, lucre, profit.

strongs_def: blood (as that which when shed causes death) of man or an animal; by analogy, the juice of the grape; figuratively (especially in the plural) bloodshed (i.e. drops of blood)
gloss: blood(-y, -guiltiness, (-thirsty), [phrase] innocent.

strongs_def: to descend (literally, to go downwards; or conventionally to a lower region, as the shore, a boundary, the enemy, etc.; or figuratively, to fall); causatively, to bring down (in all the above applications)
gloss: [idiom] abundantly, bring down, carry down, cast down, (cause to) come(-ing) down, fall (down), get down, go(-ing) down(-ward), hang down, [idiom] indeed, let down, light (down), put down (off), (cause to, let) run down, sink, subdue, take down.

derivation: (but only used in the shortened constructive form אֶל ); a primitive particle; properly, denoting motion towards, but occasionally used of a quiescent position, i.e.
strongs_def: near, with or among; often in general, to
gloss: about, according to, after, against, among, as for, at, because(-fore, -side), both...and, by, concerning, for, from, [idiom] hath, in(-to), near, (out) of, over, through, to(-ward), under, unto, upon, whether, with(-in).

strongs_def: a pit (especially as a trap); figuratively, destruction
gloss: corruption, destruction, ditch, grave, pit.

derivation: a primitive root; used only as denominative from H3027 (יָד); literally, to use (i.e. hold out) the hand;
strongs_def: physically, to throw (a stone, an arrow) at or away; especially to revere or worship (with extended hands); intensively, to bemoan (by wringing the hands)
gloss: cast (out), (make) confess(-ion), praise, shoot, (give) thank(-ful, -s, -sgiving).

strongs_def: dust (as powdered or gray); hence, clay, earth, mud
gloss: ashes, dust, earth, ground, morter, powder, rubbish.

strongs_def: properly, to front, i.e. stand boldly out opposite; by implication (causatively), to manifest; figuratively, to announce (always by word of mouth to one present); specifically, to expose, predict, explain, praise
gloss: bewray, [idiom] certainly, certify, declare(-ing), denounce, expound, [idiom] fully, messenger, plainly, profess, rehearse, report, shew (forth), speak, [idiom] surely, tell, utter.

strongs_def: stability; (figuratively) certainty, truth, trustworthiness
gloss: assured(-ly), establishment, faithful, right, sure, true (-ly, -th), verity.

verses.english: Hear, O LORD, and have mercy upon me: LORD, be thou my helper.

strongs_def: to hear intelligently (often with implication of attention, obedience, etc.; causatively, to tell, etc.)
gloss: [idiom] attentively, call (gather) together, [idiom] carefully, [idiom] certainly, consent, consider, be content, declare, [idiom] diligently, discern, give ear, (cause to, let, make to) hear(-ken, tell), [idiom] indeed, listen, make (a) noise, (be) obedient, obey, perceive, (make a) proclaim(-ation), publish, regard, report, shew (forth), (make a) sound, [idiom] surely, tell, understand, whosoever (heareth), witness.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: properly, to bend or stoop in kindness to an inferior; to favor, bestow; causatively to implore (i.e. move to favor by petition)
gloss: beseech, [idiom] fair, (be, find, shew) favour(-able), be (deal, give, grant (gracious(-ly), intreat, (be) merciful, have (shew) mercy (on, upon), have pity upon, pray, make supplication, [idiom] very.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)
gloss: beacon, [idiom] altogether, be(-come), accomplished, committed, like), break, cause, come (to pass), do, faint, fall, [phrase] follow, happen, [idiom] have, last, pertain, quit (one-) self, require, [idiom] use.

strongs_def: to surround, i.e. protect or aid
gloss: help, succour.

verses.english: Thou hast turned for me my mourning into dancing: thou hast put off my sackcloth, and girded me with gladness;

strongs_def: to turn about or over; by implication, to change, overturn, return, pervert
gloss: [idiom] become, change, come, be converted, give, make (a bed), overthrow (-turn), perverse, retire, tumble, turn (again, aside, back, to the contrary, every way).

strongs_def: a lamentation
gloss: lamentation, one mourneth, mourning, wailing.

strongs_def: a (round) dance
gloss: dance(-cing).

strongs_def: to open wide (literally or figuratively); specifically, to loosen, begin, plough, carve
gloss: appear, break forth, draw (out), let go free, (en-) grave(-n), loose (self), (be, be set) open(-ing), put off, ungird, unstop, have vent.

strongs_def: properly, a mesh (as allowing a liquid to run through), i.e. coarse loose cloth or sacking (used in mourning and for bagging); hence, a bag (for grain, etc.)
gloss: sack(-cloth, -clothes).

strongs_def: to belt
gloss: bind (compass) about, gird (up, with).

strongs_def: blithesomeness or glee, (religious or festival)
gloss: [idiom] exceeding(-ly), gladness, joy(-fulness), mirth, pleasure, rejoice(-ing).

verses.english: To the end that my glory may sing praise to thee, and not be silent. O LORD my God, I will give thanks unto thee for ever.

strongs_def: properly, heed, i.e. purpose; used only adverbially, on account of (as a motive or an aim), teleologically, in order that
gloss: because of, to the end (intent) that, for (to,... 's sake), [phrase] lest, that, to.

derivation: a primitive root (perhaps identical with H2168 (זָמַר) through the idea of striking with the fingers); properly, to touch the strings or parts of a musical instrument, i.e.
strongs_def: play upon it; to make music, accompanied by the voice; hence to celebrate in song and music
gloss: give praise, sing forth praises, psalms.

strongs_def: properly, weight, but only figuratively in a good sense, splendor or copiousness
gloss: glorious(-ly), glory, honour(-able).

derivation: or לוֹא; or לֹה; (Deuteronomy 3:11), a primitive particle;
strongs_def: not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
gloss: [idiom] before, [phrase] or else, ere, [phrase] except, ig(-norant), much, less, nay, neither, never, no((-ne), -r, (-thing)), ([idiom] as though...,(can-), for) not (out of), of nought, otherwise, out of, [phrase] surely, [phrase] as truly as, [phrase] of a truth, [phrase] verily, for want, [phrase] whether, without.

strongs_def: to be dumb; by implication, to be astonished, to stop; also to perish
gloss: cease, be cut down (off), forbear, hold peace, quiet self, rest, be silent, keep (put to) silence, be (stand) still, tarry, wait.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

strongs_def: properly, concealed, i.e. the vanishing point; generally, time out of mind (past or future), i.e. (practically) eternity; frequentatively, adverbial (especially with prepositional prefix) always
gloss: alway(-s), ancient (time), any more, continuance, eternal, (for, (n-)) ever(-lasting, -more, of old), lasting, long (time), (of) old (time), perpetual, at any time, (beginning of the) world ([phrase] without end). Compare H5331 (נֶצַח), H5703 (עַד).

derivation: a primitive root; used only as denominative from H3027 (יָד); literally, to use (i.e. hold out) the hand;
strongs_def: physically, to throw (a stone, an arrow) at or away; especially to revere or worship (with extended hands); intensively, to bemoan (by wringing the hands)
gloss: cast (out), (make) confess(-ion), praise, shoot, (give) thank(-ful, -s, -sgiving).
